content.raw:
The LIDAR occasionally returns results that appear to pass through the walls. The behavior is consistent in that it always does so for specific locations within the tunnel system: I can drive back and forth in these areas and always see the neighboring tunnel which should be obscured. This is most easily seen by viewing the pointcloud with a decay time set to something like 5 so that the points persists long enough to be seen. I’ve circled in red to show the offending points in the screenshot below, this particular one is in tunnel\_circuit\_practice.ign, and I passed at least 3 other locations just like it on the way there, which suggests it may be a problem with the model files for the tunnel segments \(which I updated about 30 minutes ago so they are recent\).

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/1392532963-image.png)
